name: Angany AI Platform
description: Enterprise AI platform providing telecommunications, configuration management, and application data services

skills.name: Telecommunications Management
skills.description: Manage SIP trunks, phone calls, users, and telecom infrastructure
examples: Create a new SIP trunk for provider connection
List all active calls in the system

skills.name: Configuration Management
skills.description: Manage system configurations, AI agent settings, transcriber/synthesizer configurations, and scenarios
examples: Set up conversation flows and workflows

skills.name: Application Data Management
skills.description: Access and manage application data, call analytics, system metrics, and business intelligence
examples: Generate call usage reports and statistics
